description: This is a FastAPI router module defining API endpoints for managing recipes, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and rating recipes. It interacts with a RecipeService for business logic.

methods.name: Page[RecipePublic] list_recipes( page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), tags: list[str] | None = Query(None), cuisine: str | None = Query(None), time_max: int | None = Query(None, ge=1), service: Annotated[RecipeService, Depends(recipe_service)] = None, )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list recipes with optional filters and pagination.

methods.name: RecipePublic create_recipe( payload: RecipeCreate, current_user=Depends(get_current_user), service: Annotated[RecipeService, Depends(recipe_service)] = None, )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new recipe owned by the current user.

methods.name: RecipePublic get_recipe( recipe_id: str = Path(...), service: Annotated[RecipeService, Depends(recipe_service)] = None, )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch a specific recipe by its ID.

methods.name: RecipePublic update_recipe( payload: RecipeUpdate, recipe_id: str = Path(...), current_user=Depends(get_current_user), service: Annotated[RecipeService, Depends(recipe_service)] = None, )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update a recipe; only the owner can update.

methods.name: delete_recipe( recipe_id: str = Path(...), current_user=Depends(get_current_user), service: Annotated[RecipeService, Depends(recipe_service)] = None, )
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a recipe; only the owner can delete.

methods.name: RecipePublic rate_recipe( payload: RatingRequest, recipe_id: str = Path(...), current_user=Depends(get_current_user), service: Annotated[RecipeService, Depends(recipe_service)] = None, )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to rate a recipe (1..5), supporting re-rates by the same user.
